fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Class SDCA<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.SDCA<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<T>, KernelSVM<T>, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SDCA<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements KernelSVM<T>

    SDCA svm algorithm from Shalev-Shwartz.

    Stochastic Dual Coordinate Ascent Methods for Regularized Loss Minimization,
    Shai Shalev-Shwartz, Tong Zhang
    JMLR, 2013.

    Author:
    picard
